reasons_to_visit.details: November offers a quiet, contemplative experience of Český Krumlov with minimal crowds.
Experience the town as locals do, without the tourist overlay of peak season.
Perfect time to thoroughly explore museums, art galleries, and historic indoor spaces.
Off-season rates provide excellent value for accommodations and dining.
Moody autumn/winter lighting creates atmospheric photography opportunities.

reasons_to_avoid.details: November is often gray, wet, and cold with limited sunshine and frequent rain.
River activities are finished for the season, and outdoor sightseeing is weather-dependent.
Significantly reduced daylight hours limit sightseeing time and photography.
Seasonal attractions begin winter closures and reduced operating hours.
